pageContext.claim: “She's created a lot of happy families. Because you're going to be up to close to 7 million people pretty soon that you are very responsible, along with many of the people at this table.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump at times has claimed his daughter Ivanka has created millions of jobs. He does not quite go that far here, though it's implied. Under the auspices of a workforce policy advisory board co-chaired by Ivanka Trump, about 200 companies have pledged to offer more than 6.5 million training opportunities to workers over the next five years. Many of these companies and organizations were already planning to offer these retraining programs.
